edu.umass.cs.gnsclient.client

Class GNSClientCommands

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umass.cs.gnsclient.client.GNSClient
      • edu.umass.cs.gnsclient.client.GNSClientCommands

  • public class GNSClientCommands
extends GNSClient
    This class defines a client to communicate with a GNS instance over TCP. This class adds single field list based commands to the GNSClient 's JSONObject based commands. This class contains a concise subset of all available server operations.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    arun, Westy

      Look up the value of a context aware group guid using a query.
      JSONArray selectNear(String field, JSONArray value, Double maxDistance)
      If field is a GeoSpatial field queries the GNS server and returns all the guids that have fields that are near value which is a point specified as a two element JSONArray: [LONG, LAT].
      JSONArray selectQuery(String query)
      Selects all records that match query.
      JSONArray selectSetupGroupQuery(edu.umass.cs.gnsclient.client.util.GuidEntry accountGuid, String publicKey, String query, int interval)
      Set up a context aware group guid using a query.
      JSONArray selectWithin(String field, JSONArray value)
      If field is a GeoSpatial field queries the GNS server return all the guids that have fields that are within value which is a bounding box specified as a nested JSONArrays of paired tuples: [[LONG_UL, LAT_UL],[LONG_BR, LAT_BR]]

      • update

        public void update(String targetGuid,
                   JSONObject json,
                   edu.umass.cs.gnsclient.client.util.GuidEntry writer)
            throws IOException,
                   ClientException
        Updates the JSONObject associated with targetGuid using the given JSONObject. Top-level fields not specified in the given JSONObject are not modified. The writer is the guid of the user attempting access. Signs the query using the private key of the user associated with the writer guid.
        Parameters:
        targetGuid -
        json -
        writer -
        Throws:
        IOException
        ClientException

      • read

        public JSONObject read(String targetGuid,
                       edu.umass.cs.gnsclient.client.util.GuidEntry reader)
                throws Exception
        Reads the JSONObject for the given targetGuid. The reader is the guid of the user attempting access. Signs the query using the private key of the user associated with the reader guid (unsigned if reader is null).
        Parameters:
        targetGuid -
        reader - if null guid must be all fields readable for all users
        Returns:
        a JSONObject
        Throws:
        Exception

      • read

        public JSONObject read(edu.umass.cs.gnsclient.client.util.GuidEntry guid)
                throws Exception
        Reads the entire record from the GNS server for the given guid. Signs the query using the private key of the guid.
        Parameters:
        guid -
        Returns:
        a JSONObject containing the values in the field
        Throws:
        Exception

      • fieldExists

        public boolean fieldExists(String targetGuid,
                           String field,
                           edu.umass.cs.gnsclient.client.util.GuidEntry reader)
                    throws Exception
        Returns true if the field exists in the given targetGuid. Field is a string the naming the field. Field can use dot notation to indicate subfields. The reader is the guid of the user attempting access. This method signs the query using the private key of the user associated with the reader guid (unsigned if reader is null).
        Parameters:
        targetGuid -
        field -
        reader - if null the field must be readable for all
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating if the field exists
        Throws:
        Exception

        Returns:

      • selectQuery

        public JSONArray selectQuery(String query)
                      throws Exception
        Selects all records that match query. Returns the result of the query as a JSONArray of guids. The query syntax is described here: https://gns.name/wiki/index.php?title=Query_Syntax Currently there are two predefined field names in the GNS client (this is in edu.umass.cs.gnsclient.client.GNSCommandProtocol): LOCATION_FIELD_NAME = "geoLocation"; Defined as a "2d" index in the database. IPADDRESS_FIELD_NAME = "netAddress"; There are links in the wiki page abive to find the exact syntax for querying spacial coordinates.
        Parameters:
        query - - the query
        Returns:
        - a JSONArray of guids
        Throws:
        Exception

      • selectSetupGroupQuery

        public JSONArray selectSetupGroupQuery(edu.umass.cs.gnsclient.client.util.GuidEntry accountGuid,
                                       String publicKey,
                                       String query,
                                       int interval)
                                throws Exception
        Set up a context aware group guid using a query. Requires a accountGuid and a publicKey which are used to set up the new guid or look it up if it already exists. Also returns the result of the query as a JSONArray of guids. The query syntax is described here: https://gns.name/wiki/index.php?title=Query_Syntax
        Parameters:
        accountGuid -
        publicKey -
        query - the query
        interval - - the refresh interval in seconds - default is 60 - (queries that happens quicker than this will get stale results)
        Returns:
        a JSONArray of guids
        Throws:
        Exception

      • selectLookupGroupQuery

        public JSONArray selectLookupGroupQuery(String guid)
                                 throws Exception
        Look up the value of a context aware group guid using a query. Returns the result of the query as a JSONArray of guids. The results will be stale if the queries that happen more quickly than the refresh interval given during setup.
        Parameters:
        guid -
        Returns:
        a JSONArray of guids
        Throws:
        Exception

      • groupGetMembers

        public JSONArray groupGetMembers(String groupGuid,
                                 edu.umass.cs.gnsclient.client.util.GuidEntry reader)
                          throws IOException,
                                 ClientException,
                                 InvalidGuidException
        Return the list of guids that are members of the group. Signs the query using the private key of the user associated with the guid.
        Parameters:
        groupGuid - the guid of the group to lookup
        reader - the guid of the entity doing the lookup
        Returns:
        the list of guids as a JSONArray
        Throws:
        IOException - if a communication error occurs
        ClientException - if a protocol error occurs or the list cannot be parsed
        InvalidGuidException - if the group guid is invalid

      • groupAddMembershipUpdatePermission

        public void groupAddMembershipUpdatePermission(edu.umass.cs.gnsclient.client.util.GuidEntry groupGuid,
                                               String guidToAuthorize)
                                        throws Exception
        Authorize guidToAuthorize to add/remove members from the group groupGuid. If guidToAuthorize is null, everyone is authorized to add/remove members to the group. Note that this method can only be called by the group owner (private key required) Signs the query using the private key of the group owner.
        Parameters:
        groupGuid - the group GUID entry
        guidToAuthorize - the guid to authorize to manipulate group membership or null for anyone
        Throws:
        Exception

      • groupRemoveMembershipUpdatePermission

        public void groupRemoveMembershipUpdatePermission(edu.umass.cs.gnsclient.client.util.GuidEntry groupGuid,
                                                  String guidToUnauthorize)
                                           throws Exception
        Unauthorize guidToUnauthorize to add/remove members from the group groupGuid. If guidToUnauthorize is null, everyone is forbidden to add/remove members to the group. Note that this method can only be called by the group owner (private key required). Signs the query using the private key of the group owner.
        Parameters:
        groupGuid - the group GUID entry
        guidToUnauthorize - the guid to authorize to manipulate group membership or null for anyone
        Throws:
        Exception

      • groupAddMembershipReadPermission

        public void groupAddMembershipReadPermission(edu.umass.cs.gnsclient.client.util.GuidEntry groupGuid,
                                             String guidToAuthorize)
                                      throws Exception
        Authorize guidToAuthorize to get the membership list from the group groupGuid. If guidToAuthorize is null, everyone is authorized to list members of the group. Note that this method can only be called by the group owner (private key required). Signs the query using the private key of the group owner.
        Parameters:
        groupGuid - the group GUID entry
        guidToAuthorize - the guid to authorize to manipulate group membership or null for anyone
        Throws:
        Exception

      • groupRemoveMembershipReadPermission

        public void groupRemoveMembershipReadPermission(edu.umass.cs.gnsclient.client.util.GuidEntry groupGuid,
                                                String guidToUnauthorize)
                                         throws Exception
        Unauthorize guidToUnauthorize to get the membership list from the group groupGuid. If guidToUnauthorize is null, everyone is forbidden from querying the group membership. Note that this method can only be called by the group owner (private key required). Signs the query using the private key of the group owner.
        Parameters:
        groupGuid - the group GUID entry
        guidToUnauthorize - the guid to authorize to manipulate group membership or null for anyone
        Throws:
        Exception

      • aclAdd

        public void aclAdd(AclAccessType accessType,
                   edu.umass.cs.gnsclient.client.util.GuidEntry targetGuid,
                   String field,
                   String accesserGuid)
            throws Exception
        Adds to an access control list of the given field. The accesser can be a guid of a user or a group guid or null which means anyone can access the field. The field can be also be +ALL+ which means all fields can be read by the reader. Signs the query using the private key of the user associated with the guid.
        Parameters:
        accessType - a value from GnrsProtocol.AclAccessType
        targetGuid - guid of the field to be modified
        field - field name
        accesserGuid - guid to add to the ACL
        Throws:
        Exception
        ClientException - if the query is not accepted by the server.

      • aclRemove

        public void aclRemove(AclAccessType accessType,
                      edu.umass.cs.gnsclient.client.util.GuidEntry guid,
                      String field,
                      String accesserGuid)
               throws Exception
        Removes a GUID from an access control list of the given user's field on the GNS server to include the guid specified in the accesser param. The accesser can be a guid of a user or a group guid or null which means anyone can access the field. The field can be also be +ALL+ which means all fields can be read by the reader. Signs the query using the private key of the user associated with the guid.
        Parameters:
        accessType -
        guid -
        field -
        accesserGuid -
        Throws:
        Exception
        ClientException - if the query is not accepted by the server.

      • aclGet

                        edu.umass.cs.gnsclient.client.util.GuidEntry guid,

                        String accesserGuid)
                 throws Exception
        Get an access control list of the given user's field on the GNS server to include the guid specified in the accesser param. The accesser can be a guid of a user or a group guid or null which means anyone can access the field. The field can be also be +ALL+ which means all fields can be read by the reader. Signs the query using the private key of the user associated with the guid.
        Parameters:
        accessType -

        field -
        accesserGuid -

        list of GUIDs for that ACL

      • selectWithin

        public JSONArray selectWithin(String field,
                              JSONArray value)
                       throws Exception
        If field is a GeoSpatial field queries the GNS server return all the guids that have fields that are within value which is a bounding box specified as a nested JSONArrays of paired tuples: [[LONG_UL, LAT_UL],[LONG_BR, LAT_BR]]
        Parameters:
        field -
        value - - [[LONG_UL, LAT_UL],[LONG_BR, LAT_BR]]
        Returns:
        a JSONArray containing the guids of all the matched records
        Throws:
        Exception

      • selectNear

        public JSONArray selectNear(String field,
                            JSONArray value,
                            Double maxDistance)
                     throws Exception
        If field is a GeoSpatial field queries the GNS server and returns all the guids that have fields that are near value which is a point specified as a two element JSONArray: [LONG, LAT]. Max Distance is in meters.
        Parameters:
        field -
        value - - [LONG, LAT]
        maxDistance - - distance in meters
        Returns:
        a JSONArray containing the guids of all the matched records
        Throws:
        Exception
